name: Jetboil Jet Gauge
description: Is that partial fuel canister enough to get you through a weekend in the backcountry? Take the guesswork out of calculating your remaining LPG. The Jet Gauge is a compact scale that screws directly to your JetPower fuel canister and measures how much fuel you have left.3 pre-sets weigh your 100g, 230g and 450g JetPower fuel canisters.4th setting lets you weigh your gear (maximum capacity 2.5kg).Digital readout displays percentage of fuel remaining.User-replaceable batteries (CR2032).
